explanation: Multiple community traders indicate short-term bullish momentum: 1-min stoch is pointing up, several comments reference imminent upward price movement (next leg up, pump hard, north direction), and technical resistance/support levels discussed align with bullish scenarios. However, warnings about using stop-losses and mentions of large sell walls suggest prudent risk management and potential volatility near resistance levels.
